thread.title: Woman commits suicide by jumping on metro track
thread.title_full: Woman commits suicide by jumping on metro track

title: Woman commits suicide by jumping on metro track
text:
Woman commits suicide by jumping on metro track IANS /Kolkata Filed on February 19, 2017 | Last updated on February 19, 2017 at 09.20 am Share 
Picture used for illustrative purposes alone (Alamy Image) The mother's body was fished out from the tracks. She was declared brought dead at the SSKM Hospital. A woman took her life by jumping before a metro train along with her child at a south Kolkata station on Saturday. Police said the woman jumped before a Kabi Subhas-bound Metro train at the Netaji Bhavan station a little after 9.00 pm. The child was rescued from the tracks and admitted to the state-run SSKM Hospital in a serious condition. The mother's body was fished out from the tracks. She was declared brought dead at the SSKM Hospital. Share
